message: Module error while trying to sync data and config with repo: git command failed: Command '['git', 'add', '.']' returned non-zero exit status 128. (CalledProcessError).

Module error while trying to initialize heating control: failed to interact with node 'system' via get: HTTPSConnectionPool(host='kazanfutes-71b78-default-rtdb.europe-west1.firebasedatabase.app', port=443): Max retries exceeded with url: /system/.json (Caused by NewConnectionError('<urllib3.connection.HTTPSConnection object at 0xf56e2a30>: Failed to establish a new connection: [Errno 101] Network is unreachable')) (ConnectionError).

Module error while trying to update local copy of weekly_cycle/1: failed to set up Google Sheets API: <HttpError 500 when requesting https://sheets.googleapis.com/v4/spreadsheets/1OmcLOB4OvFqmVw6Jq1lxu5fo7FchPBNMM6MFoNgM7r4?alt=json returned "Internal error encountered.". Details: "Internal error encountered."> (HttpError).

Module error while trying to update condensed schedule to Firebase: failed to interact with node 'schedule' via patch: HTTPSConnectionPool(host='kazanfutes-71b78-default-rtdb.europe-west1.firebasedatabase.app', port=443): Max retries exceeded with url: /schedule/.json (Caused by SSLError(SSLZeroReturnError(6, 'TLS/SSL connection has been closed (EOF) (_ssl.c:992)'))) (SSLError).

Module error while trying to update local copy of weekly_cycle/1: failed to set up Google Sheets API: <HttpError 503 when requesting https://sheets.googleapis.com/v4/spreadsheets/1OmcLOB4OvFqmVw6Jq1lxu5fo7FchPBNMM6MFoNgM7r4?alt=json returned "The service is currently unavailable.". Details: "The service is currently unavailable."> (HttpError).

Module error while trying to update local heating control config: failed to download sheet '<googleapiclient.discovery.Resource object at 0xf49b9c30>' from spreadsheet 'Kazánfűtés heating control config': <HttpError 503 when requesting https://sheets.googleapis.com/v4/spreadsheets/1sXoPC301Wurbm7yW5A956dlFEJcwM-fIb090fKOxROw/values/Sheet1%21A1%3AZ10000?alt=json returned "The service is currently unavailable.". Details: "The service is currently unavailable."> (HttpError).

Module error while trying to update local heating control config: failed to set up Google Sheets API: [Errno 2] No such file or directory: '/media/pi/program_stick/kazanfutes/config/secrets_and_env/sheets-access-key.json' (FileNotFoundError).

Module error while trying to scrape and log external temperature: error during external temperature scraping: HTTPSConnectionPool(host='api.open-meteo.com', port=443): Max retries exceeded with url: /v1/forecast?latitude=47.4984&longitude=19.0405&current_weather=true (Caused by NameResolutionError("<urllib3.connection.HTTPSConnection object at 0xf53b4ab0>: Failed to resolve 'api.open-meteo.com' ([Errno -3] Temporary failure in name resolution)")) (ConnectionError).
